alert.note: Alert for Adams; Franklin; Webster (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 15 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Franklin, Webster and southern Adams Counties through 730 AM CDT... At 659 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Holstein to near Campbell to 7 miles southeast of Upland. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Bladen around 710 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Ayr, Blue Hill, Red Cloud, Cowles and Rosemont. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
